title: New: Their Wedding – Want
content:
Their Wedding from LA set the bar for bitter band names, and their debut track, Want only further heightens the sense of lustful jealously that dominates their music.

With Panama Wedding and East of Ely releasing two of the finest indie-pop gems heard in recent times, Their Wedding wander a similar path, with their expertly written, silk sounding first outing. With the repeated refrain ‘She reminds me of you / and it’s hard ‘cus I want it so bad‘ dominating much of the track, it’s likely to shoot up the Hype Machine, and quite rightly so. Check out Want below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
